created,"},{"lineNumber":77293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　過去の遺産の再利用、という点だな」","translatedEnglishLine":" but rather a reuse of past here.\""},{"lineNumber":77297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、私なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, if it’s me..."},{"lineNumber":77298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それらを動かすことが出来るそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":" I can apparently make them move.\""},{"lineNumber":77299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふむ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm."},{"lineNumber":77300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふーん、そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":" I see, is that so.\""},{"lineNumber":77301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":77302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほどな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":77303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ではない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that’s not it!\""},{"lineNumber":77304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっぱり分からんぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t understand at all!"},{"lineNumber":77305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パットン、俺様にも分かるように言え！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Patton, explain it so even I can understand!\""},{"lineNumber":77306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうして先ほどの説明で分からないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I struggle to understand why you can't grasp it from the earlier explanation,"},{"lineNumber":77307,"originalJapaneseLine":"　理解に苦しむが……","translatedEnglishLine":" but...please, Holy Father, break it down and explain it.\""},{"lineNumber":77308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　法王、噛み砕いて説明してやれ」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":77309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、簡単に言えば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance, simply put,"},{"lineNumber":77310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聖魔教団の遺産で、","translatedEnglishLine":" it’s about the legacy of the Holy Demon Sect,"},{"lineNumber":77311,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス城を空に飛ばして逃げるそうです」","translatedEnglishLine":" that we can make Lance Castle fly through the sky to escape.\""},{"lineNumber":77312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":77313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この、ランス城を……飛ばすのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You mean, fly this Lance Castle...?"},{"lineNumber":77314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなこと出来るんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Is that even possible?\""},{"lineNumber":77315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「聖魔教団の遺産を再利用する為、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In order to reuse the Holy Demon Sect’s heritage,"},{"lineNumber":77316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺らはここまで戦いに参加せず","translatedEnglishLine":" we have been avoiding involvement in battle so far,"},{"lineNumber":77317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界各地を回り続けたんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":" and kept traveling around the world.\""},{"lineNumber":77318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来る。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It can be done."},{"lineNumber":77319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やってみせるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":" I will show you.\""},{"lineNumber":77320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス城が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance Castle..."},{"lineNumber":77321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………飛ぶ」","translatedEnglishLine":" ...will fly.\""},{"lineNumber":77322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………おお」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Oh.\""},{"lineNumber":77323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、いいぞ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, good,"},{"lineNumber":77324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはとてもかっこいいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":" that’s very cool."},{"lineNumber":77325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすが俺様の城だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":" As expected of my castle...\""},{"lineNumber":77326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーラ、本当に出来るんだな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheila, you really can do it, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":77327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、兄様が言うには……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes, according to my brother..."},{"lineNumber":77328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来る、らしいです」","translatedEnglishLine":" it seems it can be done.\""},{"lineNumber":77329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ、どうしても準備の為に時間が必要だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, we definitely need time to prepare.\""},{"lineNumber":77330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どれくらいだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How much time?\""},{"lineNumber":77331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「三十分。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thirty minutes."},{"lineNumber":77332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その間、魔軍を城に近づけないで欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":" During that time, I want the demon army kept away from the castle.\""},{"lineNumber":77333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、いいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, fine."},{"lineNumber":77334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様がやってやる」","translatedEnglishLine":" I’ll handle it.\""},{"lineNumber":77335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただーーーし！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But---!"},{"lineNumber":77336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「城が本当に飛ばなかったら、","translatedEnglishLine":" If the castle really doesn’t fly,"},{"lineNumber":77337,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死ぬまでしばくぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":" I’ll beat you until you die.\""},{"lineNumber":77338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、そんときはドンと来いだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, when that time comes, bring it on.\""},{"lineNumber":77339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたが俺を信じるなんざ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You believing in me is like a miracle."},{"lineNumber":77340,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奇跡みたいなもんだからな。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、一つ問題がある筈です」
「うむ、それは新しく作られたものではなく、
過去の遺産の再利用、という点だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but rather a reuse of past heritage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつかの条件がある筈……」
「そのために、シーラがここにいる」
それらを動かすことが出来るそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can apparently make them move."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、俺様にも分かるように言え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton, explain it so even I can understand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうして先ほどの説明で分からないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I struggle to understand why you can't grasp it from the earlier explanation,
but...please, Holy Father, break it down and explain it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王、噛み砕いて説明してやれ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s about the legacy of the Holy Demon Sect,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を空に飛ばして逃げるそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that we can make Lance Castle fly through the sky to escape."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この、ランス城を……飛ばすのか？」
「そんなこと出来るんですか？」
「聖魔教団の遺産を再利用する為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In order to reuse the Holy Demon Sect’s heritage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らはここまで戦いに参加せず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have been avoiding involvement in battle so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界各地を回り続けたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and kept traveling around the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはとてもかっこいいぞ。
「シーラ、本当に出来るんだな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sheila, you really can do it, huh?"
it seems it can be done."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、どうしても準備の為に時間が必要だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, we definitely need time to prepare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間、魔軍を城に近づけないで欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During that time, I want the demon army kept away from the castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「城が本当に飛ばなかったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the castle really doesn’t fly,
I’ll beat you until you die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、そんときはドンと来いだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, when that time comes, bring it on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたが俺を信じるなんざ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You believing in me is like a miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡みたいなもんだからな。」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
